channel.title: json on SpiderSoft
channel.description: Recent content in json on SpiderSoft

item.title: JSON objects in PHP
item.description: PHP is easy. You don’t have to know type of variable, before you use it. But sometimes it’s very problematic especially when we are dealing with JSON.

item.title: Reading unknown JSON object in go language
item.description: Exploring [The Go Language][1] is so much fun. Everything is brand new, and different then any other language. This time I’m going to show quick snippet which shows how to read JSON object with unknown structure, and map elements to something like hash table.
